name: Kill Them All (BGammer)
description:
Current town is now under zombie. Kill them all and save the city. Zombies can't alive more than 30 minute. Destroy them and survive for 30 minute. After that you would have called for the next city which is under danger. 

              Kill the zombies with confidence and survive yourself. Request your friends to play and enjoy the world wide leaderboard system. Always be the top to the leaderboard.

          Read info before starting to play.

Extract the rar file. Select FinishThem file. Then select Binaries file. Then Win32. Open the .exe file.

( FinishThem>Binaries>Win32>EXE)

Enjoy the game.
